paintball.text1: Come see our indoor field and enjoy with your gang our exciting games.
paintball.text2: We have many modes of play, come and discover them.
paintball.maxim: * The groups must be at least 6 people and maximum of 16. For mor people contact us.
paintball.agilitzar: In order to speed up the process, you can download and bring filled in the following documents:
paintball.autoritzacio: Parental consent in the case of a minor.
